info.name: Mintro API
info.description: Complete Mintro API documentation covering all Edge Functions. Professional collection for frontend integration and testing.

item.name: üîê Authentication
item.description: Supabase authentication endpoints. Use these to obtain ACCESS_TOKEN for other API requests.

request.description: Sign in with email and password to obtain an access token. Copy the access_token from the response and paste it into the ACCESS_TOKEN collection variable.

originalRequest.description: Sign in with email and password to obtain an access token. Copy the access_token from the response and paste it into the ACCESS_TOKEN collection variable.

request.description: Create a new user account. If email confirmation is disabled, you'll receive an access token immediately. Otherwise, check your email for a confirmation link first.

originalRequest.description: Create a new user account. If email confirmation is disabled, you'll receive an access token immediately. Otherwise, check your email for a confirmation link first.

request.description: Refresh an expired access token using a refresh token. Access tokens expire after 1 hour by default.

originalRequest.description: Refresh an expired access token using a refresh token. Access tokens expire after 1 hour by default.

query.description: Filter by status (draft, sent, paid, overdue)

request.description: Retrieves a paginated list of invoices with optional filtering by status, client, date range, and cost tracking status.

query.description: Filter by status (draft, sent, paid, overdue)

originalRequest.description: Retrieves a paginated list of invoices with optional filtering by status, client, date range, and cost tracking status.

request.description: Retrieves complete details for a specific invoice including line items, linked transactions, blueprint usage, and profit analysis.

response.name: Success Response

originalRequest.description: Retrieves complete details for a specific invoice including line items, linked transactions, blueprint usage, and profit analysis.

request.description: Create a basic invoice and link transactions immediately for automatic cost tracking.

originalRequest.description: Create a basic invoice and link transactions immediately for automatic cost tracking.

request.description: Create invoice with single blueprint - amount auto-calculated from blueprint's target sale price.

originalRequest.description: Create invoice with single blueprint - amount auto-calculated from blueprint's target sale price.

request.description: Create invoice with multiple blueprints - total amount is sum of all blueprint prices.

originalRequest.description: Create invoice with multiple blueprints - total amount is sum of all blueprint prices.

request.description: Create invoice with blueprint but override amount - useful for negotiated custom pricing.

originalRequest.description: Create invoice with blueprint but override amount - useful for negotiated custom pricing.

request.description: Create detailed invoice with line items, tags, and custom dates for itemized billing.

body.raw:
{
  "client": "John Smith Construction",
  "amount": 5000,
  "status": "draft",
  "due_date": "2025-12-15",
  "invoice_date": "2025-11-15",
  "service_type": "Kitchen Remodel",
  "notes": "50% deposit required upfront",
  "tags": [
    "urgent",
    "residential"
  ],
  "items": [
    {
      "description": "Labor - Kitchen Installation",
      "category": "Labor",
      "qty": 40,
      "unit_price": 75
    },
    {
      "description": "Materials - Cabinets",
      "category": "Materials",
      "qty": 1,
      "unit_price": 2000
    }
  ]
}

response.name: Success Response

originalRequest.description: Create detailed invoice with line items, tags, and custom dates for itemized billing.

body.raw:
{
  "client": "John Smith Construction",
  "amount": 5000,
  "status": "draft",
  "due_date": "2025-12-15",
  "invoice_date": "2025-11-15",
  "service_type": "Kitchen Remodel",
  "notes": "50% deposit required upfront",
  "tags": [
    "urgent",
    "residential"
  ],
  "items": [
    {
      "description": "Labor - Kitchen Installation",
      "category": "Labor",
      "qty": 40,
      "unit_price": 75
    },
    {
      "description": "Materials - Cabinets",
      "category": "Materials",
      "qty": 1,
      "unit_price": 2000
    }
  ]
}

request.description: Create invoice with blueprint overrides (variance). Use 'blueprint_usages' to specify custom actual costs and prices for this specific invoice.

Create invoice with line item cost overrides. Use 'override_split' to manually specify cost/profit breakdown for flat/bundled fee items. The 'income' must equal qty*unit_price, while 'cost' represents your actual expense.

response.name: Success Response

originalRequest.description: Create invoice with line item cost overrides. Use 'override_split' to manually specify cost/profit breakdown for flat/bundled fee items.

response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Invoice created successfully",
  "invoice": {
    "id": "new-uuid",
    "invoice": "INV-006",
    "client": "ABC Corp",
    "amount": 5550,
    "status": "draft",
    "total_actual_cost": 3400,
    "actual_profit": 2150,
    "invoice_items": [
      {
        "id": "item-1",
        "description": "Website Development - Flat Fee",
        "qty": 1,
        "unit_price": 5000,
        "is_override": true,
        "override_income": 5000,
        "override_cost": 3200
      },
      {
        "id": "item-2",
        "description": "Hosting Setup",
        "qty": 1,
        "unit_price": 500,
        "is_override": true,
        "override_income": 500,
        "override_cost": 150
      },
      {
        "id": "item-3",
        "description": "Domain Registration",
        "qty": 1,
        "unit_price": 50,
        "is_override": false
      }
    ]
  },
  "blueprints_linked": 0,
  "transactions_linked": 0
}

request.description: Update invoice fields including status, notes, and linked transactions. transaction_ids replaces ALL existing transaction links.

response.name: Success Response

originalRequest.description: Update invoice fields including status, notes, and linked transactions. transaction_ids replaces ALL existing transaction links.

response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Invoice updated successfully",
  "invoice": {
    "id": "INVOICE_ID",
    "invoice": "INV-001",
    "status": "sent",
    "notes": "Invoice sent to client via email on 2025-11-22",
    "total_actual_cost": 3200,
    "actual_profit": 1800,
    "updated_at": "2025-11-22T10:30:00Z"
  },
  "transactions_linked": 2,
  "transactions_unlinked": 0
}

response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "suggested_category": "Materials",
  "suggested_subcategory": "Building Supplies",

  "reasoning": "Merchant known for building supplies, amount typical for materials purchase"
}

request.description: Create default expense categories. Options: force=true to reset all categories, add_missing=true to add new defaults without affecting existing.

response.name: Has Linked Data

request.description: Update an existing categorization rule's properties like priority, match value, category, or active status.
List transactions that have been categorized, with optional filtering by category or method.
Remove the categorization from a transaction, returning it to uncategorized state.
Get spending breakdown by category for pie charts and reports.
Categorize multiple transactions at once. Maximum 100 per request.
Preview which transactions a rule would match before creating it. Useful for testing rule patterns.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: AI-powered analysis of user's transactions to suggest relevant expense categories and rules. Analyzes merchant patterns, amounts, and Plaid categories.

response.name: Success Response

request.description: Automatically categorize transactions using rules first, then AI fallback for unmatched transactions. Batches AI requests for efficiency.
